𓂞 Dar/reich #ḏ 𓂠 д 𓂝 𓂝
𓂞 da 𔐞 ta₂/tá vs 𔐫~𔐬 ta₃/tà take 𓂞 𐎭𐎿𐎫 d-s-t /dasta/ 𓂧 𓂞 𐀆𐀈𐀕𐀙 δεδομένα ! 𓂞 𐀇𐀈𐀯 di-do-si δίδονσι > δίδω dedicated donation dosis 𓂞 𐀈𐀨 do-ra δώρα gifts 𓂞 𐀈𐀮 do-se δώσει to give 𓂞 to give дæттын (dættyn)
𓂞 to hold дарын (daryn)

The D component was written explicitly by adding a double Delta
𓏙𓂝=𓂞 D+A = DO (tat)

𔐱+𔐑=𔐳 in Anatolian hieroglyps
𔐴+𔐒=𔐲 in Anatolian hieroglyps
𔐨+𔔂=𔐹 ⇔ 𔐩

𓂞 da-/ta- (to take) Luwian [IE *dó- (to give, to take, to exchange), CA *da- (to give)]
𓂞 dar, donner, дати dati, даꙗти dajati davati, držet
𓂞 دیاری dyarî darček darilo √give
𓂞 ذِرَاع ḏirāʿ direction

𓂞 ϯ ⇔ 𓂟 ϯⲙ dom don (give …)

𓂞 dikàke “hand” @ Bantu

𓂞 𓂧 īd יַד ايد is Arm / Hand in Semitic

𓂧 𓂞 𒁕 idum, “arm”

𓇮 𓏙 𓏏𓏏 𒁷 DON (give) 𓂞 dual

𓈖 𓏏 𓏏 | that | ante-it ien-that nathat ⇔ 𓏏 𓏏 datum 𓂞 given

𒊑 RE/RI reach : give

𓂠 ⋍ 𓂋𓂝 reach rachaq (𓂞 sic) DA.re.ich, re.nt reim / [sp]rech 𓂞 𓂋𓅱𓇋𓂾𓂻 𐀈 donn/dor
𓂠 ⋍ 𓂋𓂝 grant 𓐍 𓈖 𓏛 𓄤
𓂠 ⋍ 𓂋𓂝 menge 𓏠 macha

Δ deltal 𓇮 dorn / thorn 𓈄 drehn turn 𓏙 𓉴 Don™ dom™ ⇔ dar 𓂞 𓂧

𓂋𓂞𓂝 рѫка (rǫka) reichen/reach/reiñ/rhoi/ri@Celtic << *ratch?
𓂋𓂞 riƙe hold

𓂋 𓂞 𓂋 𓏤 | speak | rede!
𓂋 𓂞 𓅓 𓇾 𓈇 𓏤 | bury | requiem

a-ar-hu-un arrive, reach
a-ra-an-za arrive, reach (verb participle; <ār⇨)

打 da 𓂝+丁 doing ding 钉 sting 叮 deng 灯 dangle 停 delay 打 dozen 道河 don 汀 dam 𓏏 何 donde? que?
打 da 𓂝+丁 doing 订 ding 顶 ting 厅 thing 盯 think turn 𓂝+丁 Ta top 顶 hotep 宁

Hypothisis: something 𒋗 يَد yad > إيد ʾīd ⇔ with & et 𒌋 add 𓂞 da-
𒄉 AD₂GÍR a dagger ( < 𒄈 GÍR GER 个 gèr ) gunu
